summary: The module implements the data structures and logic required to interact with the DCE/RPC Endpoint Mapper service. It defines representations for protocol identifiers, data representation, RPC interfaces, and tower objects, as well as utilities for handling lookup handles and performing endpoint lookup and mapping operations.
business_intent: Provide the capability to query and resolve RPC services on remote hosts by communicating with the Endpoint Mapper, enabling discovery of available interfaces, ports, and protocols for network administration, security testing, and automated remote procedure call interactions.
